content.detailedDescription: Apeared to be a oil patform till it moved of and up and then stayed stoinary for about 20 min. wile i walked alone on  the beach manoria looking craft.
content.summary: Apeared to be a oil patform till it moved of and up and then stayed stoinary for about 20 min. wile i walked alone on  the beach manoria looking craft.

content.detailedDescription: At approx 2330  (1130 pm) i looked up and saw three bright round lights in a triangle form roughly 100 ft wide and 50/75 ft east to west.  only lasted 1-2 seconds then went out.  no sound.  it was directly over my head .  just happened to look up and saw it.  thaught it had to be a ufo always wanted to see one.
content.summary: Triangle bright red lights lasted 1-2 seconds , then went out.  no sound whatever.   approx 25 mi north of eugene, or  leading light to the westa

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were driving home from my sisters house when i saw a light in the sky.  i pointed it out to her and she pulled into the neighborhood we were driving past and stopped the car.  we both got out of the car and observed 3 orange object that at first looked like an orb, but as they flew closer to us that were shaped like a small triangle, no larger than 5 feet in diameter.  we were coming from the north towards us in a southern direction, and were at differing altitude, from 100 to 500 feet off the ground.  we took a few pictures then thought they might be chinese lanterns. as we turned to get back in the car we saw two very bright lights, in a south-south east direction.  they were further off, more than a mile.  we drove over to  a nearby park to get a better look at them.  when we got out of that car there we took a few more pictures of them, they were both stationary for more than 2 minutes, then one began to move around, then away from the stationary one toward the north.  they were oval, and a very bright white light.  we wondered if we could see them from our neighborhood which was at a higher altitude and looked over the valley.  se we drove home and found that we could see them very well from there as well, about 5 miles further away.  we went to our neighbors home and told them about it.  they wanted to see them, so both of our families got in our cars and drove over to the neighboring golf course to see them.  they were still there.  in all we saw 4 bright white objects, moving around a stationary object that was on the top of the mountain on the other side of the valley. we observed them for over 15 minutes, taking a 2 minute video as well.  during that time we could see airplanes coming into the slc airport, and these lights were much brighter than them, larger, and made no noise.  within 5 minutes after leaving the gold course we heard two helicopters fly by, very unusual at night here, especially christmas eve night.  i went back tonight to confirm that the stationary light is in fact something on the top of the mountain over saratoga springs, though we do not know why the objects were flying around it.  the still picture taking in highland gives a very clear observation of their shape.  and the video shows their movement, the extreme brightness when they would first appear, and the random flashes, as well as the methodical less bright flashing.
content.summary: Small orange triangles, and large bright white oval objects

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were driving home from the beach, along belcher, headed towards countryside blvd.  i noticed a large glowing light with a smaller, slowly and intermittently blinking light moving slowly in a straight path below it.  i pointed it out to my husband, and he said it was a radio tower. after a short while, the smaller blinking light disappeared from sight, but i don't know if it disappeared, or if i lost sight of it behind trees.  the larger light was flying along a path just north of sr 580.  as my husband and i approached countryside blvd, i mentioned about the light again, and said that i didn't think it was a radio tower, and he said it was an airplane.  i felt the object was traveling way too slow to be an airplane, so he turned off of countryside, onto sr 580.  we started to drive west on sr 580, and the object was about to head over a small road and over a shopping center, so we turned down the road to get a better look.  the object had three yellowish lights, in a perfect triangular pattern.  we did not see any blue/red safety lights.  the object crossed the road ahead of us, and made a slow turn to start heading across sr 580.  at this point, i was losing sight of it behind trees, and having my husband turn around to follow it, because i thought it was just traveling way to slow to be an airplane.  as my husband is turning around, i notice 3 more lights appear on the object.  by the time we had turned around and headed back to the place where it should have been, it had vanished.  we continued driving around the neighborhood, in the direction it should have been, since it was so slow, and we could find no sign of it.
content.summary: Triangular ufo with small flashing companion

content.detailedDescription: 3 witnesses, large orange ball of light that came in a straight path, stopped and hovered, and then went in a 45 degree angle, then stopped and turned quickly in on 90 degree angle. event was followed by 3 military planes going in the direction of the object.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orange/red ball of light, very noticable in night sky

content.detailedDescription: Monday ���dec. 26th, 2011���. i saw a round orange sphere. the time was about 7:50pm to 7:52pm. i estimate seeing it for about 2 minutes. after it was no longer visible i checked the time and it was 7:52pm. it was bright orange���steady color of light with nothing blinking at all. no ffa marking lights. in size appearance, it was about 3 times larger than the planet jupiter from my location. i was in west valley city traveling north. the object was north of me. it was heading eastward towards down town salt lake city. it was near the salt lake international airport. i was driving, so i pulled over and stopped. i turned off the engine and got out of my truck. it was slowly moving and was at about 3,500 feet off the ground. it was just barley high enough to clear the mountain ranges east of salt lake city valley. a few seconds after i got out of my truck it stopped too. it hovered for about 15 seconds. it was silent. then it took off in a north northeastward direction. as it took off it appeared to almost turned red orange, it appeared to be accelerating fast and climbing in altitude on or about a 30 degree angle upward... then it dimmed and was orange in color again. it rapidly kept dimming and disappeared. i mean disappeared as in disappeared before it flew away. it did not disappear from sight due to distance.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Round orange sphere

content.detailedDescription: I was out on my front porch with my sister and it faces the north and east. i saw what at first assumed was a plane because i see them all of the time. i immediately noticed the object was a bright orange color that has no definite shape other than being smallish and round-oval. as soon as i noticed the color of the object, i then saw another similar object come into view right behind the first one. it all happened pretty quick, but i was saying to my sister as i'm trying to figure out exactly what it is i'm seeing, kate, what the heck are those things? as i'm saying that another identical object comes into view behind the first two. then another, then another, totaling 7 of these identical orange lights flying in a line, one after the next, moving in the direction of west to east. it seemed each one came out of nowhere to join the line. they made no sound as they moved across the sky in line formation, they didn't change colors or anything like that, they stayed orange. they were approximately 10-20 feet between each one. they flew across the sky and one by one disappeared as they flew up to what seemed like a higher altitude. we had called our whole family out to witness these lights and not one person could come up with an idea for what we saw. it was pretty incredible, strange and scary all at the same time. i think we will definitely remember this christmas in my family!
content.summary: Saw 7 lights following one another in a mostly straight line. flew across the sky  for about 3-4 minutes and one by one disappeared as they had appeared one by one.

content.detailedDescription: Right above my head got a video not the first time ive seen this  im in complete awww and seriously ready to talk to somone!
content.summary: Red ufo spotted again!!! video proff allenpark taylor

content.detailedDescription:
Driving south on rt 95 between mass pike & rt 95 about 1pm dec 26, bright, beautiful day. i see small object hovering over the road and joke to my daughter that it is a ufo. approaching at 65mph, about 30 degrees off the horizon. appears to be a craft or a balloon upon closer inspection; my daughter thinks it is a balloon. yet, it is hovering over the road, twisting in such a way that the sun reflected off a shiny silver metallic saucer shaped surface. the distinctive feature are cephalopod or propeller shaped appendages coming off the edge of the disc/saucer. they were metallic, not organic, but could have been inflated legs on a saucer shaped balloon. the object wavered but was otherwise stationary over the road during the time we approached it, about one minute in duration. my impression was of a small craft about 6 feet wide maybe 50 or 100 feet in the air. my daughter thought it was a balloon, but she has never seen a ufo before, while i have. the event had the surreal characteristics of seeing something 'impossible', in close proximity in bright daylight with no surrounding objects to obstruct the view. about ten minutes later we saw a small single engine airplane landing at about the same height off the ground, and the plane seemed at least ten times as large, maybe larger, making the ufo seem more the size of a large balloon. we lost sight of the object when we passed under it going down the road.

i would like to know of any other reporting of this event, as dozens of cars must have seen it, maybe hundreds. thank-you.
content.summary: Small disc shaped metrallic craft with fat, mechanical cephalopodic appendages at edge of disc seem while driving down rt 128 at 1pm today between mass pike and rt 95 south by two people in a car

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking the dog at night ( 9-10pm )
i was facing south and looked up and saw a very red star.
i thought, is this thing redder than betelgeuse?
i looked to the right and it was.
it was nearly overhead, starlike
it slowly changed to white, and i thought, ok , its twinkling.
it was motionless compared to the stars around it.
then it moved slowly to the southwest

i said, ok its a plane.
but no flashing strobes on the thousands of planes i have seen.
ok, if it is a satellite it will move constantly to the south west.
i lined it up with 2 stars and it moved southwest (slowly)
it became red again
it then curved back to the south east 
and the just to the south
i watched it for 3 more minutes until i couldn't see it any more 
it disappeared in the south (never less than 30 degrees from horizon)
it appeared high up.

i am an amateur astronomer and have never seem anything i could not identify, ever.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Lights in sky

content.detailedDescription: We were on a cruise that left maimi,fa. second day out we were in the carribean ocean. after dinner we went to the top deck and was looking over the side of the ship six of us noticed a metal-like bird that was flying like a hummingbird but looked like a hawk that had a metal belt with a green beam shining  on the ship below our deck it flew up, over and you could see the wings flapping really fast but looked like something out of a transformers movie . the bird-like thing was about maybe 15 feet away from us flew up to our deck side ways, shot out past us right in front of the ships filr camera on side of back ship then disappeared. it was about 9:30 at night the sky was crystal clear you could see every star in the sky .There was no land beside us or anywhere around . everyone could not believe it. would a real bird stop and check out a boat it doesnt make sense this bird and i mean bird wasnt normal we were so close we could see the wings moving they were like metal. i cant find anything on the net about this somebody has to seen something like this. six people all seen this this is real what is it .Is it something the goverment has or did we really see a bird that was not from here what was it looking at this really has all of us puzzled
content.summary: Metal like bird with like belt that had green beam that inspected our cruise ship in the carribean ocean

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the back of the house, looking out the window to see how the farm animals were doing when i noticed a red-orange round / sphere with a white halo floating over the neighbors back yard around the tree top line.  

the object was moving left and right, up and down. as i called my wife to the window to see the object, i opened the window to listen for noise when i heard the next door neighbor say "what the &&&& is that?".  the object did not emit any noise that we could identify.

as we watched the object, i said to my wife, keep an eye on the object and i will be right back.  i ran to get my cell phone,  turned on the camera and headed out the front door to take a picture.  as i turned around the corner, nothing was in the sky.

my wife said as the door opened, the object took off directly north over my neighbor's land and right above our home a white flash of light occurried at the same time.  

unfortunely, i was not able to get any pictures or movies of any object.
content.summary: Red-orange ball with white halo

content.detailedDescription: On christmas night was waiting in a car with friend to go out. noticed two large orange lights appear through the treeline to east. both ascending rapidly and moving south. watched objects for several minuts as they then slowly began a slow curve to the ese at altitude. approx two minutes after first two lights took off a third light ascended rapidly from the same location in the distance beyond tree line. last light joined the other two and all moved off in a easterly direction. the area it seemed to rise from is  suburban with many homes, businesses etc. however no airports are in the general direction to my knowledge (having checked google earth to be sure.)
content.summary: Three large orange objects in sky seeming to take off from ground.

content.detailedDescription:
Outside a big bright flash (star shape) in southwest sky towards buzzards bay.. i saw this before about 2 weeks ago. it caught my attention.  kept a  eye for it to  happen again. didnt.
   tonight outside smoking a cigar. looked up watchin the the  night sky.  its dark in new england this time of year.  couldnt belive it, saw it again. different  location more to  right in the sky. bright flash.(star like) lasted 2 seconds just like before.  went in told my wife about the past one and  now this, got my biccnuc"s hung outside for a  few.. nothing. so  about 20 minutes later takin the  trash out just happened to look  up  when "flash bright light" again in a different location  40 degrees to where i  saw it before...    very strange..Wasnt a tele-communacation satalite wasnt a plane  wasnt a falling star.  lived  on army bases in south pacfic and  seen missle testing etc.  this was very werid.
content.summary: Bright flash  seen in sky  3 x over the past 3 weeks, different locations

content.detailedDescription: Live in nassau county, long island.  this ball of light was huge, a very distinct orange glow to it.  if you were outside in my area, it will be reported by others.  it was a once in a lifetime sighting.  could have been a meteor, not sure. i was so shocked and confused as to what i was looking at, and it lasted for a very long time.  outstanding....
content.summary: Large bright orange

content.detailedDescription: Live in nassau county, long island.  this ball of light was huge, a very distinct orange glow to it.  if you were outside in my area, it will be reported by others.  it was a once in a lifetime sighting.  could have been a meteor, not sure. i was so shocked and confused as to what i was looking at, and it lasted for a very long time.  outstanding....
content.summary: Large bright orange

content.detailedDescription: We were outside the plimpton's house, a house my friend kyle takes care of for rich people living in arizona.  while he was trying to get the door locked i noticed a golden colored star flying about airplane speed, mentioned to him to take a look.  he agreed that he had never seen anything of the sort before, neither had i.  object flew east to west, right over i70. distance to the object was unknown.
content.summary: Golden colored star flew though vail last night, no flashing airplane lights on it.

content.detailedDescription:
11-11-11
it was a clear night 360 degree view of the universe from where i live.Every night i look and marvel at the skies.This particular night,i had just arrived at home.As soon as i got out of the car, i noticed a bright light that seemed to be "out of place". i looked to my south and saw a very large, dull amber colored sphere. at first i thought is was a i then looked to my north and witnessed the north star,trying to make a comparison of the two.There are tons of sattelites encircling all of the time, but for some reason 3-4 sattelites went off course and made a beeline toward this object.The sattelites appeared to be taking pictures of the sphere, and all of a sudden, the sphere starting shooting beams towards the sattelites. meanwhie,other unidentifiable aircraft(2 planes)began to hover to the east of me, not making a sound. the sattelites in succession started backing up. the sphere began to glow brighter,let off a sonic boom and went out like a light. i fell to my knees in disbelief.The sattelites hovered in the same area for 30 minutes, then continued their regular paths.I'm so glad that i had other people to witness this marvelous event as well.
content.summary: Saw large amber light hovering;3-4 satellites beelined to light;object shot beams at sattelites and light made sonic boom sound and dissapeared

content.detailedDescription:
Small bright bluish-white disk similar in appearance to jupiter but maybe 3 times larger flew sw over the house. the object was moving fast and appeared to dip or drop in altitude and then flatten out again. it was out of sight in 4 seconds or less. made no sound and displayed no tail or trail of sparks. the object flew in essentially a straight line at a constant speed. speed appeared to greatly exceed a commercial jet liner. first thought it was remnant of a firework. we noticed it because it was bright; very crisp in appearance.

we were rather speechless at first then we starrted sharing our amazement. we lost sight as it went behind trees.
content.summary: Lighted very small disk flying overhead

content.detailedDescription:
While walking my dog to the park, i noticed a very bright puple light off to my left.  i stopped and looked at it.  it was randonly moving, almost like it was enjoying itself.  it would climb staight up, flip around, fade in and out of sight.  it appeared to move from side ot side about half of my line sight.  moving all directions, back and forth, up and down.  a helicopter came in from behind me, from the west. i looked at my ipod to  see the time, 10:50.  as soon as this appeared and flew towards the object, going about a mile eastward.  the object just blicked off, and was not seen again, at least for the next hour while i was at the park.

 all the time i was observing this happening, i was trying to find someone else to point it out.  im not easily baffled, but this was unlike anything i had seen before.  ive watched hang gliders, planes, even comets and falling stars. this did not act as they do.  

i am going back in the morning with camera, and see what happens
content.summary: Very bright purple light, faded in and out, did abnornal movements

content.detailedDescription: While standing in fernhill park on my lunch break, talking on the phone, looking at the sky and stars, which is typical for me when the weather allows, i observed a large, glowing, bright white object appear to fall or decend from the sky in the east. it happened very quickly, about as fast as it takes to watch a shooting star and it reminded me of watching the same, although i know this was no shooting star or meteor, which i have seen plently of. i first noticed the object at about the level of the tree line, it quickly decended out of sight & i had the thought that it had landed somewhere. the object was roughly one and a half to two times the  size of the airplanes that were flying nearby. i am unable to accuratly judge the distance that it was from me, but i am assuming it was a few miles or more, considering the size relevant to the nearby airplanes that i am sure were further away than it. i felt amazed and somewhat in shock at seeing this, so much so that i commented to the person i was talking to on the phone "i don't know what i just saw, but i know that wasn't normal" i then proceded to explain the phenomenon i had just witnessed while continuing to watch the sky for another appearance, which was not forthcoming. this occured on the evening of december 23rd between 5:15-5:20pm and i continued to watch the sky until 5:35 when i had to return to work.
content.summary: Standing in the park on my break i observed a large, bright white glowing object decend & appear to land at an unknown distance

content.detailedDescription:
Last night my wife and i went to bed shortly before 10 pm.  at 10, my wife got up and went to the window of our upstairs bedroom.  she observed a glowing object in the southern sky.  it faded out.  i got up and went to the window and a second object appeared.  it was about 40 degrees above the horizon, and it appeared to be moving from north to south.  it was much larger than a star and its surface was covered with twinkling red/yellow/orange lights.  it had an irregular outline.  we watched this object for a couple of minutes, and then it also faded out.  a third object then appeared.  i got the camera and started getting dress to go on the downstairs south patio.  the third light faded, and a fourth appeared.  i went on the patio and took a nice picture of this object shortly before it faded.

we are near holloman afb, and we have seen the strings of orange flares which the air force uses.  these were distinctly different.  the picture shows two objects one above the other.  they are connected by a fuzzy irregular tubular structure.  i concede that the lower object could be a burning smoking fragment sloughed off of a main flare, but, if so, then it is like no flare that i have ever seen before.  also, these were close enough and bright enough that we should have seen the supporting parachute.  i hope to see them again.

the camera is a panasonic dmc-zs3 in the sports scene mode and 12x zoom.
content.summary: Lights over ruidoso

content.detailedDescription: at 1809 p.M. on feb 4th 2009 i was at hydro one 55 acre construction site guarding it sitting in the driver seat of  my car and observing.Suddenly i have noticed a tiny flying object over the hill reaching towards the transformer area. i immediately sensed it a very tiny object and grabbed my sonydigital hi8 camcorder. the craft had white luminous light it first touched the lower hydro line an then reached the higher hydro line touching it. then it slowly moved towards the transformer and hovered over for few minutes. it also beeped a total of 9 times and emitted dark sphere beam as it beeped.Then the light intensity increased tremendously like mercury and it hovered overhead. the dog in the nearby house was heard barking couple of times as it hovered. (the house owner reported the dog died later). it slighly ascended and hovered static for sometime and beeped. 2 faint lights were seen at the back in some distance and altogether they made as triangle.(please watch the video). you can also hear my voice in excitement. later it moved above my head and gradually vanished towards easterly direction. 3 years passed still it is fresh in my memory. i was shocked and excited. this is my 2nd such sighting out of 4 total sightings including one ufo crash. i have submitted one video 2 days back of the sighting in 2009 where the ufo hit my construction trailer. i have 2 more videos of the sightings on different dates which i will submit later after seeing your response. please analyze this video and let me know. thanks. please put my name on the video. regards.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Tiny ufo with bright light, hovering, luminates, beeps, glows, radiates.

content.detailedDescription: We were leaving my parents house around 8pm and saw the object directly above my parents house(approx. 500 ft above). it was a large red/orange light about 1/4 the size of a full moon, with smaller yellow/white lights (3-4) that seemed attatched right behind. my wife and i ran inside to show my parents and they came outside too. it was flying fairly slow east to west, also gaining altitude. after approx. 2 min it started heading more north in 5 min it have dissapeared out of our sight.
content.summary: Large red/orange bright light with yellow/white lights behind it flew east to n.West ascending

content.detailedDescription:
Our family took a drive to see the huge display's of lights on houses.
we stopped at one. my kids got excited and poked there heads out the van window. i grabbed my i phone and stared to snap photo's using the passenger mirror!  with all the lights and music,of course i didn't either see with the naked eye or notice a cluster of three lights in the sky behind us in the mirror. i was taking many with seconds. these were taken about a minute long. there was no other abnormal sounds. no weather conditions. no moon or stars. 

i download my photo's today, being so busy with the holiday. i clean out some of my bad takes. to my surprise again, i looked at the photo's to see something that didn't belong there. behind us there it was bright as day. perfect 3 cluster lights. i read on these before. i'm sure the lights attracted the ufo. i have 4 photo's of the ufo and one before where it is not there.Please scrach my kids faces before publishing. thank you.
content.summary: My family and i drove over to see a house full of lights. i thought it was so cute my kids sticking there heads out to see. i took photos useing my iphone. i took them in the mirror. i download my photo's and seen a cluster of 3 white lights together

content.detailedDescription: On christmas eve 2011 in tequesta, florida. i and 2 other people, in my family, were outside after i had observed a ufo 30 minutes earlier. we were sitting outside of the house on the patio and observed 4 lights traveling at cloud level, and going through the 1 big cloud over the coast and lighting the cloud up orange, as it came onshore. the object traveled above the loxahatchee river being visible for 3-5 minutes and then the objects, following one another, turned sw and then flew off into space at a 45% angle. the entire encounter is caught on 3 videos by 1 of the witnesses with me, who is my son, and the other is my brother.
content.summary: $ or more lights  seen by myself and 2 others on christmas eve flight path from out over the ocean over the loxahatchee river and then up into space.

content.detailedDescription:
I'm seeing another one.  i returned home from a christmas party with friends around 10:00pm and was doing some work on my computer.  i hadn't been drinking.  my living room window is directly behind me facing due east.

around 1:30 am i started to shutdown to go to bed when i glanced out the window and noticed a flickering light in the sky (same as i've reported in the last several days with the exception of blue lights).  it seems to be hovering above the ham lake-andover, mn area.  it seems to be lower tonight than on previous nights.  there are light wispy clouds in the background of the object.  so i'm assuming this one isn't in orbit as i supposed the others were.

i have been watching it now since 1:37 am and it is now 2:11 am.  it has given no indication of moving from its position.  i wish it would come closer so that i could get a good clear picture of it.

i should report that two days ago i did observe the same star like object in orbit, but there were two of the one preceding orion and one following orion in orbit.
content.summary: Larger than star sized, flashing lights of red, green, yellow, white in the middle.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were on our way to visit family christmas morning. i was driving ��� she was the passenger, and we were traveling south east on route 23 through valley forge national park. as we approached the intersection near the park's visitor center, i looked up (towards the visitor center and over the outer line defense of the park) and saw a shiny, reflective, almost chrome looking object in the sky. it was spherical, maybe egg-shaped and appeared to be stationary in the sky. it looked a little like an old bubble-style helicopter fuselage...But not. i asked my girlfriend jokingly if she wanted to bet if the object was an aircraft or a ufo. we watched the object for a few seconds. i had to keep an eye on the road since i was on a curving hill coming up on an intersection, but my girlfriend was watching the object while fumbling for her camera phone. small tree tops obstructed my view for less than a second, and then the object was completely gone. i think it shot off in a north western direction, but i cannot be sure. it was there one second and completely gone the next. my girlfriend was not able to get a shot off with her camera phone before the object took off/vanished. it should be noted that this sighting took place less than 2 miles from a lockheed martin facility.
content.summary: Ufo over valley forge national park

content.detailedDescription: We were in a movie theater parking lot 7:45 pm 12/25/11 parking the car to go see a movie saw several people looking to the eastern sky.We saw 5 red lights moving in the sky heading west southwest all were in a similar path but unorganized group they changed direction east southeast and started to disappear one after the other they seemed to be gaining altitude as they moved out of view also 2 more followed a similar path west southwest than east south east disappearing into the sky.
content.summary: Red lights over chicago

content.detailedDescription: Close to an airport all my life, never seen anything with all red lights and no sound. see planes all the time, tried to call my wife out look at it. did not report until i saw someone reported. don't know what it was, but very different than normal.
content.summary: Very red, west to east travel, no noise
